Elements.Name: attackActive
Description: Buff Sonic's damage.

Elements.Name: auraActive
Description: Always have Phantom Rush active

Elements.Name: trailOn
Description: Enables a trail for both Super and Hyper Sonic.  This is active at all times unless at a standstill.

Elements.Name: burstTrailOn
Description: Enables a trail for both Super and Hyper Sonic.  This is active at all times unless at a standstill.

Elements.Name: superBehavior
Description: Enables Hyper Sonic custom moves for boss fights regardless of form.

Elements.Name: disableDamage
Description: Enables invincibility.  Enemies will be damaged upon touching Super or Hyper Sonic.  May cause softlocks.  Press in both thumbsticks to reload Sonic, which should resolve any softlocks unless the enemy themself softlocks.

Elements.Name: hyperFlash
Description: Instakill most enemies within a nearby radius.

Elements.Name: hyperFlashWhiteDisable
Elements.DisplayName: Disable white flash during Hyper Flash
Description: Disables the white screen flash effect for the Hyper Flash.  Intended for those who are bothered by it.

Elements.Name: flashFade
Description: Makes the Hyper Flash fade out.

Elements.Name: hyperFlashExplosion
Description: Toggles additional effects during the Hyper Flash.

Elements.Name: hyperStomp
Description: Deals massive damage to most enemies in a sizeable radius.

Elements.Name: hyperSpinDash
Description: Powers up the spin dash with a wider hitbox radius and a spark trail.

Elements.Name: hyperStompCameraShake
Description: Toggles screen shake during Hyper Stomp.

Elements.Name: hyperFlashCameraShake
Description: Toggles screen shake during a Hyper Flash.

Elements.Name: hyperSpinBoostCamera
Description: Makes the camera shake during a Hyper Spin Boost.  Do not use if you're sensitive to camera movement.

Elements.Name: hyperSpinBoostChargeCamera
Description: Makes the camera shake when charging a Hyper Spin Boost.  Do not use if you're sensitive to camera movement.

Elements.Name: chaosMeteor
Description: An original move.  While transformed into a Hyper state, hold parry and press X.  Deals a high amount of damage to anything within a small radius.  Release the X button to perform a Chaos Blast as a follow-up.  Press X rapidly while holding parry to charge it up, which will allow you to move around freely while in the Chaos Meteor state for a brief time.  The extended hitbox radius will still be active during this state.  Alternatively, hold X to hold the charge.

Elements.Name: hyperStandingBurst
Description: While stationary as open world Hyper Sonic, press and hold the boost button, then move the analog stick in any direction to boost, leaving behind an explosion.  For aethetics only at the moment.

Elements.Name: hyperLock
Elements.DisplayName: Force Hyper Sonic abilities on all characters
Description: Makes the camera shake when charging a Hyper Spin Boost.  Do not use if you're sensitive to camera movement.
Turns on custom physics.  The physics used will be dependent on which open zone model you choose.
Turns off custom physics.

Enables realtime cutscenes.  Only the cutscenes before and during the final boss (except for the final cutscene) are currently supported.  Support for additional cutscenes will be added over time, as testing is needed throughout various points in the game.
Turns off realtime cutscenes.
This sets you to base Sonic.  It also disables custom physics, regardless of what's selected above.
